DOC.brief_title: Weekly Paclitaxel Plus Gemcitabine Second-line Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The treatment consist paclitaxel 80 mg/m2 gemcitabine 1,000 mg/m2 give intravenously day 1 8 21-day cycle . Patients receive treatment every 3 week till disease progression
